name: BombGuy
description:
WARNING:⚠ THIS IS MORE OF A PROTOTYPE ⚠

Disclaimer:This is my first game that I've ever finished, I'm going to be making some games here and there, be warned though if you download this or any of the games that have the above warning I probably won't update it and it'll be super unfinished/buggy. The reason I labeled this as a finished game though is because I have no plans to work on this anymore. "So why upload this then!!?!?!" I know the game is garbage but I want a visual time lapse of my progression, sorry for wasting your time.

Description: Help Bomb Guy click the bombs before they blow up.

Art by: https://twitter.com/chotido

(Any and all feedback welcomed and encouraged, negative or positive!)
